sentences.sentence: Why settle for a froufrou cup of calories when you can have this frothy and yes, healthy Cafe Latte meal?
sentences.translation: 为什么解决了热量frou - frou杯的时候，你可以有这样的泡沫，是的，健康的咖啡拿铁饭吗？

sentences.sentence: Shaving cream: I love the idea of shaving cream, but sometimes the fruity or floral varieties marketed to women are just too froufrou for me.
sentences.translation: 剃须膏：我喜欢剃须膏，但是市场上那些专门为女性设计的有着水果或是花香的剃须刀对我而言只能是一般般。
